description:
## Subscription Platform API (POST Only)

This collection contains only the two required POST endpoints:

1. **Subscribe to Website** - `POST /api/subscribe`
2. **Create Post** - `POST /api/posts`

### Pre-seeded Websites

The system comes with these websites pre-loaded:

| ID | Name | URL |
|----|------|-----|
| 1 | Increasing Happiness | https://increasinghappiness.org/ |
| 2 | Follow IT | https://follow.it/ |
| 3 | My Popups | https://mypopups.com/ |
| 4 | Inisev | https://inisev.com/ |

### Usage Instructions

1. Set the `base_url` variable to your application's URL
2. Use the subscription endpoint to add email subscribers
3. Use the post creation endpoint to publish new content

### Validation Rules

- Email must be valid and not already subscribed to the website
- Website ID must exist (1-4)
- Post title and description are required

### Responses

- **201 Created**: Successful operation
- **422 Unprocessable Entity**: Validation errors
